TextBlock.Text: BOBER: Turns out this purple moon is quantum. It's also made of a drug from our species named Lean, so we'll go with that name.
BILLY: Bober, stop explaining what this is. We have just landed here, let's explore. And we'd better make the most of it, considering how annoying it was to get here.
KATHERYNE: Wait, what the hell is that thing?
BOBER: Holy sh... That's an engraving in the stone! It looks hexagonal...
BILLY: No shit sherlock. Assuming we read this from top-left and then right and down, like our coordinate blocks on the Vessel, this pattern reads as middle-left, bottom-left.
KATHERYNE: Are we not going to question why there is a piece of a Nomain coordinate on this random moon?
BOBER: No, we're not. That's not important right now. What is important is that there's an engraving of the Troll Fa-
KATHERYNE: No, no hell no! Fuck no! We are NOT going to the goddamn Troll Face planet to find another coordinate! Fuck that shit. We're gonna do something different.
KATHERYNE: Okay, just listen to me for a moment. Why don't we build a space station using the abundant resources in this system?
BILLY: And what purpose would the station have..?
KATHERYNE: We'd use it to "hack" the Lean, so that we can easily extract all the coordinates from it.
BILLY: That's a great idea, that would save us so much time! Let's get building!
NOTE: THE STATION IS IN A POLAR ORBIT AROUND BLUE
